pr_title: [GEOT-6664] Cleaning up use of Eclipse EMF depdencies.

timeline.message:
Cleaning up use of Eclipse EMF depdencies.

Signed-off-by: Jim Hughes <jnh5y@ccri.com>

Cleaning up use of Eclipse EMF depdencies.

Signed-off-by: Jim Hughes <jnh5y@ccri.com>

timeline.bodyText: So this change does not actually change the version number, just adjust to reflect xsd dependency changing to group org.eclipse.emf eh?
timeline.author: jodygarnett

replies.bodyText:
The version number and groupId for org.eclipse.xsd both changed.
I wanted to pull out this version as a property to make it easier to coordinate between GT and GS.
replies.author: jnh5y
